title: Mini-Ep 225: A Brand Newt Day
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 225: A Brand Newt Day
itunes:subtitle: Kate takes a different kind of plunge into Pond's Cold Cream and Doree updates us on her toe. Then, listeners ask about products for scalp cleansing and thicc facial moisturizers, second Nora McInerny’s request to normalize registries, and introdu...
description:
Kate takes a different kind of plunge into Pond's Cold Cream and Doree updates us on her toe. Then, listeners ask about products for scalp cleansing and thicc facial moisturizers, second Nora McInerny’s request to normalize registries, and introduce Kate to a new amphibious hobby. 

 

Activity of the week: Go birding or herping! 


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.
  • Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
